education_text.0: He graduated from      redirect    The Bronx High School of Science The Bronx High School of Science in 1968           and went on to receive a Bachelor of Science degree and a Master of Science degree from      Columbia University Columbia University in New YorkHe graduated from      redirect    The Bronx High School of Science The Bronx High School of Science in 1968           and went on to receive a Bachelor of Science degree and a Master of Science degree from      Columbia University Columbia University in New YorkThe first book he authored, in 1987, C Traps and Pitfalls, had been motivated by his prior paper and work, mostly as a staff member at Columbia University, on a different computer language,      PLThe first book he authored, in 1987, C Traps and Pitfalls, had been motivated by his prior paper and work, mostly as a staff member at Columbia University, on a different computer language,      PL
